name: Paint it Back - Full Release (Oculus Quest)
name_original: Paint it Back - Full Release (Oculus Quest)
description:
Welcome to the end. The world is dead, abandoned, lifeless. Colorless.

Embark on a bittersweet journey, look for clues, memories of the old world to discover what happened to… us. To find the answers, you will have to look into yourself.

Your guide and only friend on the road will be a sarcastic AI, Origo. Who needs enemies when you have friends like that?

During your up to ten-hour journey, Paint it Back merges exploration, flying, dialogue-heavy storytelling, puzzles, and mini-games. On your path to discovery you will:

- Traverse diverse and mysterious worlds.
- Solve puzzles and gain new abilities.
- Unlock mini stories and films.
- Develop an emotional bond with the AI.

Available in English and Japanese.

For players new or sensitive to VR, motion sickness, nausea, disorientation, blurred vision or other discomfort may occur while viewing virtual reality content. If you experience any of these symptoms, stop using immediately and remove the VR headset.

Your feedback is greatly appreciated!

Consider joining our Discord:
https://discord.gg/2NnBDHYeMu
